original: intros T U F proper_F f l l' filterlim_f filterlim_f'. unfold filterlim in filterlim_f, filterlim_f'. unfold properly_filter in proper_F. unfold closely in *. intros eps. specialize (filterlim_f (ball l eps)). specialize (filterlim_f' (ball l' eps)). intros Hl Hl'. specialize (Hl (filter_filter F) eq_refl). specialize (Hl' (filter_filter F) eq_refl). clear filterlim_f filterlim_f'. destruct Hl as [x Hl]. destruct Hl' as [x' Hl']. specialize (Hl (fun y => exists eps' : posreal, ball l eps' y)). specialize (Hl' (fun y => exists eps' : posreal, ball l' eps' y)). apply is_filter_lim_close. - intros P HP. destruct (filter_ex F P HP) as [t Pt]. exists t. intros. destruct H as [eps' Heps]. apply Pt. apply (Hl y eps'). apply Heps. auto. - intros P HP. destruct (filter_ex F P HP) as [t Pt]. exists t. intros. destruct H as [eps' Heps]. apply Pt. apply (Hl' y eps'). apply Heps. auto.
